alert.note: Alert for Broadwater; Meagher (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 6:06PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broadwater and west central Meagher Counties through 630 PM MDT... At 603 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 17 miles west of White Sulphur Springs, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and a period of heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fort Logan On The Smith River and Fort Logan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may lead to minor localized flooding of streets, small creeks, and low-lying areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Minor debris flow out of the Big Belt Mountains from the Deep Creek burn scar is also possible through around 8 pm.
